page.title: 17Education.
page.content: Tintagel C.P.School is the only school in Tintagel and it has 150 pupils aged 4_11.There are 5 classes in the school two infant classes including "rising fives"(children who attend part time before they are 5)and three junior classes.There are 13 staff_the Head master,4 full time teachers(2 for "Head's relief"and 2 remedial teachers)a caretaker,cleaner and 3 kitchen staff.The school was opened just before the 1st.World War.In 1984 it was extended and a hall,kitchen, cloakroom and library were built.The school also has 3 temporary buildings, 2 classrooms,an office and staffroom. The curriculum includes the traditional subjects and practical work in science,maths,gardening and use of a computer. Visits are made to places of interest.
